channel.title: iCreatedHorror for Moderator!
channel.description:
I truly think iCreatedHorror should be nominated for some sort of Moderator position. He literally talks to me everyday on MSN of how he reports so much stuff on here. I think he would be a great moderator and would be a positive change to this community.
He is a great man, and a good friend. He knows what he's doing. iCreatedHorror for moderator!

item.title: iCreatedHorror for Moderator!
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

We will look into this. This doesn’t mean he’s being considered or anything. Thanks for the suggestion.

Read full topic
